content.text:
Which of the following testing methods should be used to evaluate the uniformity and compactness of crushed stone fill?<image 1>

A. Static penetration test
B. Light power penetration
C. Heavy power penetration
D. Standard penetration test

To determine the uniformity and compactness of crushed stone fill, the most appropriate testing method is:

D. Standard penetration test

The standard penetration test (SPT) is commonly used to evaluate the properties of soils and fills, including their density and uniformity. It involves driving a split spoon sampler into the ground using a standardized hammer and counting the number of blows required to drive the sampler a specified distance. This provides valuable information about the compactness and uniformity of the material.
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
